item.title: 重装系统 - win
item.description:
重装系统 - win

1.删除预装应用

  • 管理员权限运行PowerShell
  • Get-AppxPackage *程序名* | Remove-AppxPackage

2.删除Onedrive

3.禁止win10自动安装应用

  • 打开注册表 regedit
  • 进入路径 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Policies\Microsoft\Windows\
  • 右键点击新建项“CloudContent
  • 双击新建的CloudContent，在右栏右键新建DWORD（32位）值或新建DWORD（64位）值，并命名为DisableWindowsConsumerFeatures
  • 双击DisableWindowsConsumerFeatures，在数值数据输入1，确定

4.设置资源管理器默认打开我的电脑

5.安装软件

7-zip

  • 设置文件关联
  • 设置右键菜单

花蜜密码+SS

  • 准备运行环境

Google Chrome

  • 登陆账户，同步设置

ASUS Splendid Video

  • 地址

MarkEditor

坚果云

  • 定义同步文件夹
  • 安装网速监控

Cmder

  • 设置Cmder和Git的环境变量（Path）
    • %GIT_HOME%\bin
  • 更新
  • 设置git相关

添加到右键 管理员权限终端，输入Cmder.exe /REGISTER ALL

中文乱码解决 修改vendor/clink.lua文件，替换第20行set_prompt_filter函数

function set_prompt_filter()
    -- get_cwd() is differently encoded than the clink.prompt.value, so everything other than
    -- pure ASCII will get garbled. So try to parse the current directory from the original prompt
    -- and only if that doesn't work, use get_cwd() directly.
    -- The matching relies on the default prompt which ends in X:\PATH\PATH>
    -- (no network path possible here!)
    local old_prompt = clink.prompt.value
    local cwd = old_prompt:match('.*(.:[^>]*)>')
    if cwd == nil then cwd = clink.get_cwd() end

    -- environment systems like pythons virtualenv change the PROMPT and usually
    -- set some variable. But the variables are differently named and we would never
    -- get them all, so try to parse the env name out of the PROMPT.
    -- envs are usually put in round or square parentheses and before the old prompt
    local env = old_prompt:match('.*%(([^%)]+)%).+:')
    -- also check for square brackets
    if env == nil then env = old_prompt:match('.*%[([^%]]+)%].+:') end

    -- build our own prompt
    -- orig: $E[1;32;40m$P$S{git}{hg}$S$_$E[1;30;40m{lamb}$S$E[0m
    -- color codes: "\x1b[1;37;40m"
    local cmder_prompt = "\x1b[1;32;40m{cwd} {git}{hg} \n\x1b[1;30;40m{lamb} \x1b[0m"
    cmder_prompt = string.gsub(cmder_prompt, "{cwd}", cwd)
    if env == nil then
        lambda = "λ"
    else
        lambda = "("..env..") λ"
    end
    clink.prompt.value = string.gsub(cmder_prompt, "{lamb}", lambda)
end
